names.english: mulberry leaf and sesame seed pill
names.commonEnglish: Mulberry Leaf and Sesame Seed Pill

actions: Disperses and scatters Wind-Heat, calms the Liver, clears the eyes, clears Heat from the Lungs, stops cough and moistens Dryness.
Nourishes and fortifies Liver and Kidney Yin, nourishes Jing and Blood, extinguishes Wind and moistens and lubricates the Intestines and Lungs.
With Sang Ye, for dizziness, blurred vision, tinnitus and headache due to Liver and Kidney Yin Deficiency with ascendant Yang and numbness, flank pain and constipation due to Blood or Yin Deficiency.
Moistens the Intestines, nourishes the Lungs and stops coughing.

syndromes: Yin Deficiency, Dried Blood with Wind-Dampness
notes: Make into 9g pills and take one pill twice a day. Take with salted water in the morning and wine in the evening.
